result.ga: Bhuel tabhair an carr seo ann amárach

result.html: Bhuel tabhair an carr seo ann amárachWell, take the car there tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuel taḃair an carr seo ann amáraċWell, take the car there tomorrow.

result.eng: Does she help him?
result.ga: An dtugann sí cabhair dó
result.orig: An dtugann sí cabhair dó
result.html: An dtugann sí cabhair dóDoes she help him?
result.ponchtml: An dtugann sí caḃair dóDoes she help him?

result.eng: They thanked God for saving them from the danger.
result.ga: Ghabh siad buíochas le Dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirt
result.orig: Ghabh siad buíochas le Dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirt
result.html: Ghabh siad buíochas le Dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirtThey thanked God for saving them from the danger.
result.ponchtml: Ġaḃ siad buíoċas le Dia as iad a ṫaḃairt slán as an gcontúirtThey thanked God for saving them from the danger.

result.eng: It was the children who saved us!
result.ga: Na leanaí a thug slán sinn
result.orig: Na leanaí a thug slán sinn
result.html: Na leanaí a thug slán sinnIt was the children who saved us!
result.ponchtml: Na leanaí a ṫug slán sinnIt was the children who saved us!

result.eng: An allowance will be awarded by virtue of Article 279.

result.ponchtml: Taḃarfar liúntas de ḃua Alt 279An allowance will be awarded by virtue of Article 279.

result.eng: This is a good example of what happens when amateurs undertake the research.
result.ga: Seo sampla maith dá dtiteann amach nuair a thugann amaitéaraigh faoin taighde
result.orig: Seo sampla maith dá dtiteann amach nuair a thugann amaitéaraigh faoin taighde

result.eng: I will make you fall in love with me after we're married!
result.ga: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadh
result.orig: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadh
result.html: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadhI will make you fall in love with me after we're married!
result.ponchtml: Taḃarfaiḋ mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósaḋI will make you fall in love with me after we're married!

result.eng: It was bad of me not to give you advice.
result.ga: Ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibh
result.orig: Ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibh
result.html: Ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibhIt was bad of me not to give you advice.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċloíte an ṁaise dom é gan coṁairle a ṫaḃairt daoiḃIt was bad of me not to give you advice.

result.eng: She would bet that his hair has gotten greyer.
result.ga: Thabharfadh sí an leabhar go raibh a chuid gruaige tar éis dul i léithe
result.orig: Thabharfadh sí an leabhar go raibh a chuid gruaige tar éis dul i léithe
result.html: Thabharfadh sí an leabhar go raibh a chuid gruaige tar éis dul i léitheShe would bet that his hair has gotten greyer.
result.ponchtml: Ṫaḃarfaḋ sí an leaḃar go raiḃ a ċuid gruaige tar éis dul i léiṫeShe would bet that his hair has gotten greyer.

result.eng: ...before they went to their dull houses in the suburbs.
result.ga: sular thug siad aghaidh ar a dtithe murtallacha sna bruachbhailte
result.orig: sular thug siad aghaidh ar a dtithe murtallacha sna bruachbhailte
result.html: sular thug siad aghaidh ar a dtithe murtallacha sna bruachbhailte...before they went to their dull houses in the suburbs.
result.ponchtml: sular ṫug siad aġaiḋ ar a dtiṫe murtallaċa sna bruaċḃailte...before they went to their dull houses in the suburbs.

result.eng: I visited the city in the eighties.
result.ga: Thug mé cuairt ar an chathair sna hochtóidí
result.orig: Thug mé cuairt ar an chathair sna hochtóidí
result.html: Thug mé cuairt ar an chathair sna hochtóidíI visited the city in the eighties.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé cuairt ar an ċaṫair sna hoċtóidíI visited the city in the eighties.

result.eng: The biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.
result.ga: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siad
result.orig: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siad
result.html: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siadThe biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.

result.eng: The Prime Minister announced to the media that he was about to resign.
result.ga: Thug an Príomh-Aire le fios do na meáin go raibh sé ar tí éirí as
result.orig: Thug an Príomh-Aire le fios do na meáin go raibh sé ar tí éirí as

result.ponchtml: Ṫug an Príoṁ-Aire le fios do na meáin go raiḃ sé ar tí éirí asThe Prime Minister announced to the media that he was about to resign.

result.eng: Along with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
result.ga: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh
result.orig: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh

result.ponchtml: Fara aire a ṫaḃairt don leanḃ ḃí uirṫi an teaċ a ġlanaḋAlong with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.

result.eng: They gave her some pocket money.
result.ga: Thug siad airgead póca di
result.orig: Thug siad airgead póca di
result.html: Thug siad airgead póca diThey gave her some pocket money.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug siad airgead póca diThey gave her some pocket money.

result.eng: He spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.
result.ga: Chaith sé seal i bPáras sular thug sé aghaidh ar Mheiriceá

result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ sé seal i bPáras sular ṫug sé aġaiḋ ar ṀeiriceáHe spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.

result.eng: The Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].

result.orig: Thug túr theas an Lárionad Trádála uaidh

result.eng: When I was asked what kind of room I wanted in the hotel, I answered carefully.
result.ga: Nuair a tugadh mo rogha seomra dom san óstán d'fhreagraíos go cúramach

result.eng: Because of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ga: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.orig: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais

result.ponchtml: De ḃarr na ḃforbairtí seo ḃí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránaċ a ṫug deis dó feiḋmiú mar iriseoir ar ḃonn doṁanda agus ar ḃeagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.

result.eng: The relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
result.ga: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochta
result.orig: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochta
result.html: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochtaThe relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
result.ponchtml: Tugann scaoilteaċt an idirlín ardán d'aċan ċineál cancráin a ḃeiṫ ag caiṫeaṁ anuas ar ḋaoine eile faoi sciaṫ na ganḟiosaíoċtaThe relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.

result.eng: Sometimes the media pay attention to those cases, other times they don't.

result.eng: The board was giving information about the history of the place.
result.ga: Bhí an clár ag tabhairt eolais faoi stair na háite
result.orig: Bhí an clár ag tabhairt eolais faoi stair na háite
result.html: Bhí an clár ag tabhairt eolais faoi stair na háiteThe board was giving information about the history of the place.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an clár ag taḃairt eolais faoi stair na háiteThe board was giving information about the history of the place.

result.eng: That's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.
result.ga: Sin an rud a thug an bealach mé
result.orig: Sin an rud a thug an bealach mé
result.html: Sin an rud a thug an bealach méThat's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.
result.ponchtml: Sin an rud a ṫug an bealaċ méThat's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.

result.eng: I'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.
result.ga: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féin
result.orig: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féin
result.html: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féinI'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.
result.ponchtml: Taḃarfaiḋ mé air a ċuid smugaċán díṁúinte a ċoinneáil aige féinI'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.

result.eng: They gave me as much education as they could afford.
result.ga: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainne
result.orig: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainne
result.html: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainneThey gave me as much education as they could afford.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug siad scoil agus léann doṁ ar feaḋ a n-acṁainneThey gave me as much education as they could afford.

result.eng: There is no describing the love I had for that girl.
result.ga: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaí
result.orig: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaí

result.ponchtml: Níl léaṁ nó scríoḃ nó inse béil ar an ġrá a ṫug mise don ċailín udaíThere is no describing the love I had for that girl.

result.eng: Don't ever fall in love with a woman.
result.ga: Ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoi
result.orig: Ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoi
result.html: Ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoiDon't ever fall in love with a woman.
result.ponchtml: Ná ṫaḃair grá do ċroí ċoíċe do ṁnaoiDon't ever fall in love with a woman.

result.eng: They all made a promise to one another.
result.ga: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.orig: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.html: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.
